description:
Learning from very basic takes some time, but after the initial stages, you'll get it very easy, and it shouldn't take more than a month to master this program, the PHP web development is not that difficult to learn as shown on the web, but with a practical & positive approach, it gets very easier gradually.

This is the complete course about the drupal CMS, In this course we will cover everything about drupal ,We will built some professional sites with drupal, Also we will make an advanced online Learning Management System with drupal.

After this course you will be able to create advanced and customized web Apps using Drupal.
title: Drupal from Basics to Advanced with 3 Live Projects
